House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03556
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING THE OUTSOURCING OF WORK AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE ARTICLE 106 OF PRESIDENTIAL DECREE NO. 442, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to regulate outsourcing of work by providing conditions for its practice and penalties for any violation.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GO, MARK O.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
